<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Piranha Swarm](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1155)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

More teeth and fury than body, few fish command as much fear and anxiety as the piranha. They move almost exclusively in schools, overwhelming larger creatures with sheer numbers and ferocity. Piranhas aggress toward sudden disturbances in the water and can smell blood from far away. Harvested piranha teeth serve as excellent cutting tools.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 18

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 16

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 3">[Piranha Swarm](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1155)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=9" />
<trait label="Aquatic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=168" />
<trait label="Swarm" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=239" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 3](/Sources.aspx?ID=66) pg. 99</row>

**Perception** +9; blood scent, [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=23), [scent](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=33) (imprecise) 100 feet

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +10, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +8

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +1

**Dex** +3

**Con** +2

**Int** -5

**Wis** +2

**Cha** -2
</row>

**Blood Scent** The piranha swarm can smell blood in the water from up to 1 mile away.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 16 

**Fort** +9 

**Ref** +10 

**Will** +7 

</row>

**HP** 40

**Immunities**
precision, [swarm mind](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=36)

**Resistances**
bludgeoning 5, piercing 2, slashing 5

**Weaknesses**
area damage 5, [splash](/Traits.aspx?ID=150) damage 5

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** swim 30 feet

**Feeding Frenzy** <actions string="Single Action" />  Each enemy in the swarm's space takes 2d6 piercing damage (DC 20 basic Reflex save). A creature that fails the save also takes 1d6 [persistent bleed damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) and takes a –2 circumstance penalty to their Reflex saves against Feeding Frenzy while this damage continues, as the piranhas' frenzy increases in intensity when they smell blood.

</column>
